mapper.select: SELECT permission_id, permission_name, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_permissions
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_permissions WHERE permission_id = #{id}

SELECT erp_permissions.permission_id, erp_permissions.permission_name, erp_permissions.created_date, erp_permissions.modified_date FROM erp_role_permissions JOIN erp_permissions ON erp_role_permissions.permission_id = erp_permissions.permission_id WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_permissions ( permission_id, permission_name, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{permissionId}, #{permissionName}, #{createdDate}, #{modifiedDate} )
